pageProduct.name: Swisse Beauty Collagen Balance 120g Powder
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Swisse Beauty Collagen Balance Powder is a premium quality beauty supplement featuring Collagen Peptides, Vitamin C, Cinnamon, supergreens and enzymes. This great tasting formula helps support collagen production, skin repair and a healthy digestive system function.

Helps improve skin elasticity
Supports healthy digestive system function
Great tasting natural pineapple flavour
Quick dissolving formula that's 97.4% sugar free

Size: 120g

Warnings

If symptoms persist, talk to your health professional. Vitamin supplements should not replace a balanced diet.

Ingredients

COLLAGEN (Hydrolysed) 2.5 g
VITAMIN B3 (nicotinamide) 10 mg
VITAMIN C (ascorbic acid) 300 mg
BROMELAINS 25 mg
CINNAMON (Cinnamomum cassia extract 133.33 mg) equiv. dry bark 2 g
KALE (Brassica oleracea v. viridis extract 41.67 mg) equiv. dry leaf 250 mg
SPINACH (Spinacea oleracea extract 55 mg) equiv. dry herb 275 mg

Directions

Using the enclosed scoop, mix one level scoop (6 g) with 250 mL of water or juice. Consume once daily, during or immediately after a meal, or as directed by a healthcare professional. Once dissolved, consume immediately. Some settling of the powder may occur after mixing.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 25°C in a cool, dry place. Do not use if cap seal is broken. Powder may settle prior to opening.
